title: Chapter 53
body:
Chapter 53


After Zhao Youyue saw the reply from Su Li, tons of comments from her fans suddenly appeared in the group –


“Master Su, your methods of ditching responsibilities are just awesome!”


“Yeah right, look how innocent you are, your promises sounded sweeter than any other melodies!”


“Change the finale, or we will leave the group. Ming the Scumbag can die, but Xu Jing must live on …”


“Leave group! Leave group! Leave group!”


“Scr*w you, Master Su! This finale gave me nightmares, and thanks to you, I’m totally depressed! Now, pay for my loss!”


“How could you be so cruel? Ever since my goddess turned from a side character to a supporting character and have gotten her background settings, everything became terribly dreadful and miserable. From the beginning, I really thought that she and Yang Xixi would be together with full happiness. I had never thought that Yang Xixi would be same like her brother, taking my goddess as a friend of benefits. In the end, she brought along her brother’s head and disappeared along with a nice boat, taking away the will of living from my beloved goddess Xu Jing. It seems true that only studying would never betray Xu Jing.”


…


The group was filled with condemnation. At this moment, to make her entrance more appealing, Zhao Youyue distributed 1,000 RMB worth of slogan red packets[1] in the group straight away. The slogan inscribed was – I’ve never met such a shameless person!


There were 50 packets in total, averagely 20 RMB per person. This was like a meal worth of money. This time, the slogan immediately flooded the entire screen of the group!


When Su Li discovered it was her Number One Sect Master’s red packets, she did not even bother whether the slogan was against her. She too shamelessly shared the slogan and successfully grabbed 50 bucks, as if she was proving the slogan right. Her red packet was far above average, and this instantly cheered her up.


What was a Number One Sect Master?


Of course it was a Sect Master who was placed first in the fan ranking. Her fan points were over 500,000 points, equivalent to tipping over 5,000 RMB. Su Li surely would have opted to compromise such a true tyrant reader. Besides, the red packets distributed by “Youyue” in the group were at least 100 RMB per distribution. That was why when Su Li noticed the red packet of this tycoon, she grabbed it without any hesitation.


Surprisingly, this time it was a 1,000 RMB gigantic red packet!


The group was filled with the voices of worshipping –


“Thank you, Youyue the God of Tycoons, now I have money for my supper!”


“It was a blessing to be in the same group with Tycoon Youyue. I was planning to leave the group, but for Tycoon Youyue, I decided to stay here shamelessly.”


“Thank you, God of Tycoons. Damn! This is the first time I grabbed such a huge red packet… I’m thrilled!”


“Are you lacking of leg accessories, Tycoon Youyue?”


“Guess what I saw just now? How dare you grab the red packet of Tycoon Youyue, Su Li the liar! You are totally shameless!”


“Thank you, God of Tycoons! Also, did I remember that someone promised not to trick the Sect Masters in the beginning? And now? Lol…”


“Tycoon Youyue, it’s best not to read Su Li, the King of Toxic’s new work. You will end up getting tricked again!”


“Missed it!”


“Missed it +10086!”


…


After seeing the fans persuading “Youyue” not to read her new works, Su Li had the urge to kick the troublemakers out of the group. Anyway, she needed to hold “Youyue” tight as she was not just a plain tycoon. By just looking at her Qidian account, she had at least tipped seven titles or thereabouts. Not only Sect Master, but of course she had a lot of titles such as Court master[2] or Coxswain[3]. To her, 100 RMB was just like 1 RMB, she could simply tip them away. It was truly the style of a tycoon. Although she could not be comparable to those super tycoons who could tip millions to some broadcasters, but in the Qidian novel and manga section, Youyue was already considered godly. Nowadays, it was pretty hard to find such tycoons who loved novels and manga-s.


Thankfully, for Su Li, the highest tip from “Youyue” was for “Pure Romance”. In other words, she was the favourite amongst them. Now that she had created such a finale, she was really worried that “Youyue” would leave the group in a fit of anger and would never read any of her works again.


Regarding “Youyue’s” gender, the God of Tycoons, it was actually a mystery to everyone. Simply because both her Qidian accounts and QQ info were set as female, and her nicknames seemed pretty feminine. Including Su Li, plenty believed that “Youyue” should be a male. After all, why would a girl read such a manga like “Pure Romance”? Not to mention tipping a buttload of money.


But….Who would ever imagine that Zhao Youyue actually did not favor “Pure Romance” that much. Anyhow, “Pure Romance” did help her a lot. Besides, she successfully grabbed hold of the iconic character card “Xu Jing” in the end. Although she frequently said that the finale of “Pure Romance” had nothing to do with her, but for someone as warm-hearted as her, she would still have the thought of compensating Su Li. Fortunately, what she had the most was money. A few thousand RMB was like a couple of bucks to her, she could just tip them to Su Li. After all, Su Li was considered a beauty. As for Zhao Youyue, people with outlooks and talents were admirable, regardless of their gender.


That was why if Su Li was actually a wretched ugly middle-aged guy, she would not have treated him with kindness, not to mention that the early stage of “Pure Romance” had brought up so much bad impressions. If possible, Zhao Youyue did not want to enter such illogical harem-based title. She could only skate on thin ice to make this kind of title into a “legendary masterpiece”. Contents like cleaver or nice boat could not be used twice.


At that moment, Su Li was really afraid that “Youyue” would leave the group. Unhesitantly, she promoted “Youyue” to the group admin and also added “Youyue” as her friend. She believed if “Youyue” was a male reader, he should already be attracted to a pretty mangaka like her now. She decided to send some of her portrait photos to “Youyue” as the additional benefits. Know that she was quite confident in her face and figure…


That’s right, this was Su Li. She had nearly no resistance to the tycoon readers. She would never accept bloody words like “What reader? I’m your dad”.


All along, she treated the readers as her lifeline. Readers are Gods!


Just as Su Li grabbed a 50 RMB red packet and thanked “Youyue” the God of Tycoons shamelessly, she saw “Youyue’s” reply. “Originally, this 1,000 RMB was to be the tip for ‘Pure Romance’ to commemorate its ending. But after reading the finale, I decided to distribute them in the group, giving it to everyone.”


After her words was spreaded, fans in the group bursted with joy. They either replied “Good job” or posted some stickers with big smiles. It was obvious that this Tycoon “Youyue” was teasing Su Li and clearly they loved to see that. Now, there was this trend of throwing muds at Su Li in the group. However, this act of throwing muds was out of good intentions. The fans who truly could not accept the finale of “Pure Romance” had left the group a long time ago.


Seeing the reply from “Youyue”, although knowing that she was just making a joke, it still prickled Su Li’s heart. Sigh, why is this society so cruel?


Just as this thought bloomed in Su Li’s mind, Zhao Youyue smirked “demonically” and tossed all the screenshots of the dark histories from her phone to the group…


Translation note:


[1] – Slogan red packet – QQ Slogan red packet is a function opened for QQ friends and QQ groups. When QQ users distribute a red packet (online currency), they can add the “slogan” function. The distributing user can set a slogan for the slogan red packet, and the QQ friend or QQ group users need to key in the respective slogan to be able to grab the red packet.


Additional note: – Red packet


An in-app online currency transfer method. Red packet is a traditionally used term for pocket money in China, received by children during the Chinese New Year. But is now widely used in some social media apps like Wechat and QQ or other apps to represent online money transfer for certain apps.


[2] – Court master


Similar to “Sect Master”, “Court Master” refers to a novel reader who has obtained 20,000 loyalty points of a particular novel(equivalent to 200 RMB) on that novel.


[3] – Coxswain


Similar to “Sect Master”, “Coxswain” refers to a novel reader who has obtained 10,000 loyalty points of a particular novel(equivalent to 100 RMB) on that novel.
